title: aDigi sukamu
sahitya:
aDigi sukhamu levvaranubhavincirirA! AdimUlamA rAmA! 
(aDigi)

anupallavi

SaDalani pApa-timira kOTi sUrya! sArvabhauma sArasAkSa!
sadguNa nin  
(naDigi)

caraNam 1

Ashrayinci varamaDigina sIta yadaviki bOnAyE; Ashara haraNa
rakkasi iSTamaDugu napuDE mukkupOye O rAma! nin
(naDigi)

caraNam 2

vAsiga nAradamauni varamaDuga vanita rUpuDAyE
Ashinchi
durvAsulu annamaDuga apuDE mandamAyE; O rAma nin 
(naDigi)

caraNam 3

sutuni vEDuka jUDa dEvakiyaDuga yashOda jUDa nAyE
satulella
rati bhikSamaDuga vArivAri patula vIDanAyE; O rAma nin  
(naDigi)

caraNam 4

nIkE daya buTTi brOtuvO! brOvavO nI guTTu bayalAye
sAkEtadhAma!
shrI tyAgarAjanuta svAmi  yETimAya! O rAma nin   
(naDigi)
